item.title: Nordic NRF52840 Storage Part II
item.description: This post is the continued talk about the persistent storage for Nordic nRF52840. In part I we went over using the Flash Data Storage (FDS) library. In this part II, I’ll be discussing another import component, user information configuration registers (UICR).
